ygData.subject: Re: Thieves and meanies!
ygData.msgSnippet: It is sad yes but unfortunately that is what we live with in game and out. Best thing to do is to make sure you check all that you buy before hand and to make
ygData.messageBody:
It is sad yes but unfortunately that is what we
live with in game and out. Best thing to do is to make
sure you check all that you buy before hand and to
make sure you have all the PP in the trade box before
you hit trade, and never trust one to give to another
unless you take into account the risk. It is called
living on the safe side. Sadly enough we dont live in a
completely honest world in game or out. Just have fun with
the best parts and take the bad ones as they
come.<br><br>Happy hunting all.....;)
